abstract: The Korean Grand Prix goes to the test in its second year of operation.
snippet: The Korean Grand Prix goes to the test in its second year of operation.
lead_paragraph: YEONGAM, South Korea - It's a long but agreeable train ride from Seoul down to Mokpo, where the Korean Grand Prix takes place at the Yeongam track just outside town. But once at the circuit, you feel a little bit out in the middle of nowhere.

headline.main: Notes From the Paddock in Korea
